title: Paving the way for Terabit Ethernet
author: techradar-pro
summary: A Q&A with Tim Klein, CEO at the storage connectivity company ATTO
article: Despite advancements in Wi-Fi technology and the recent introduction of Wi-Fi 6, Ethernet is still the go to technology businesses utilize when they need to move large amounts of data quickly, particularly in data centers. While the technology behind Ethernet is now more than 40 years old, new protocols have been developed over the years that enable even more gigabytes of data to be sent over it.

To learn more about the latest technologies, protocols, advancements and the future of Gigabit Ethernet and perhaps even one day soon Terabit Ethernet, TechRadar Pro spoke with Tim Klein, CEO at the storage connectivity company ATTO.
